name: @logion/exiftool.pl
description: A distribution of exiftool perl executable.

scripts.download: rm -rf vendor; curl -L https://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/exiftool/Image-ExifTool-12.44.tar.gz | tar xz; mv Image-ExifTool-12.44 vendor; cd vendor; ls | grep -v 'lib\|exiftool' | xargs rm -r

author: Logion Team <info@logion.network>
